quality_assessment: Page is comprehensive and well-structured but missing documentation for the analyze command type which exists in the codebase and is actively used in workflows

issues.description: Missing documentation for analyze command type which exists in source code and is used in multiple workflows
issues.fix_suggestion: Add documentation section for analyze command type with syntax, fields (max_cache_age, force_refresh, save, format), and examples from workflows/tech-debt.yml and workflows/analysis-workflow.yml. Show caching behavior and when to use force_refresh.
issues.evidence: Command type defined at line 332 with signature 'pub analyze: Option<HashMap<String, serde_json::Value>>' and used in workflows/tech-debt.yml:3, workflows/coverage.yml:21, and workflows/analysis-workflow.yml:19,29,38

issues.description: Quick reference table missing the analyze command type
issues.fix_suggestion: Add row to quick reference table for analyze command with description: 'Codebase analysis with caching' and key features: 'Cache control, force refresh, format options'

positive_aspects: Excellent structure with quick reference table for easy navigation (lines 5-14)
Clear distinction between command types with exclusivity rules well documented (lines 409-432)
Rich examples from actual workflows with source file references throughout
Good use of MkDocs Material admonitions (tip, warning, info boxes) for important notes
Comprehensive coverage of deprecated test command with migration guidance (lines 434-456)
Source code line references for each command type providing traceability
Clear explanation of command exclusivity with valid/invalid examples
Common use cases provided for each command type in admonition blocks
Cross-references to related documentation pages at end (lines 458-466)
Well-documented common fields section covering parameters across all command types (lines 393-408)
Validation output format clearly specified with JSON examples (lines 348-358)
Goal seek result types documented (Complete, Incomplete, Failed) at lines 166-169
Foreach variable access documented with ${item} syntax at lines 240-241
Write file format types documented with clear descriptions at lines 282-286
improvement_suggestions: Add analyze command documentation with examples showing max_cache_age, force_refresh, save, and format options
Consider adding a diagram showing the relationship between command types and when to use each
Add troubleshooting section for common command type mistakes (e.g., trying to combine multiple command types)
Include performance considerations for different command types (e.g., foreach parallelism vs MapReduce)
Add examples showing how analyze command integrates with Claude commands for AI-assisted analysis

metadata.validation_focus: Check all command types are documented
